title: Global cost of living and rising prices - R2

dialogue.speaker: A
dialogue.text: What do the new AI regulations actually require?

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Three things: Disclose how models work. Regular safety audits. Clear user notifications.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: That's a crucial point. The implications here are really significant for everyone involved.

dialogue.speaker: B
dialogue.text: Fines up to 4% of global revenue. That's serious money.
